mapper.select: SELECT NO ,CC.CODE_NAME AS CAR_NAME ,NC.CAR_TYPE_CODE ,NC.CAR_FUEL_CODE ,(SELECT COMMON_CODE.CODE_NAME FROM GENIECAR.COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE =(SUBSTR(NC.CAR_FUEL_CODE,4,3))) AS FUEL_NAME FROM NEW_CAR NC, COMMON_CODE CC WHERE NC.CAR_NAME_CODE = CONCAT(CC.GROUP_CODE, CC.CODE) AND NC.CAR_NAME_CODE = #{carNameCode}
